SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_purchase_order (supplier, po_no, contract_code, distribution_type, pay_type, receive_warehouse, annex_url, sender, sender_phone, send_area, send_address, send_time, pack_require, receiver, receiver_phone, receive_area, receive_address, create_time ) values (#{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributionType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveWarehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annexUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{packRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update t_purchase_order set supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, po_no = #{poNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distribution_type = #{distributionType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_warehouse = #{receiveWarehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, annex_url = #{annexUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender = #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender_phone = #{senderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_area = #{sendArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_address = #{sendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pack_require = #{packRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_area = #{receiveArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_address = #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where po_id = #{poId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select po_id, supplier, po_no, contract_code, distribution_type, pay_type, receive_warehouse, annex_url, sender, sender_phone, send_area, send_address, send_time, pack_require, receiver, receiver_phone, receive_area, receive_address, create_time from t_purchase_order where po_id = #{poId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
